price: 79. [Iblîs (Satan)] said: "My Lord! Give me then respite till the Day the (dead) are resurrected."
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi fa-anẓir'nī ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
